main event: A security officer observed a bright blue-white light moving rapidly in an irregular manner over Westover AFB on May 15, 1962.
interesting points: The light was described as moving rapidly and changing direction and speed., The observation lasted for 5-10 minutes before the light disappeared., Multiple witnesses were involved in the observation., The light's behavior did not match known natural phenomena such as ball lightning., There was a suspicion that the observed light might have been a large and brilliant meteor.
witness description: Security officers and personnel from the 114th Combat Defense Squadron, noted for their reliability and observational skills.
